name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Small Header Image For Google Plus

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes the huge header image in Google Plus a lot smaller, and more friendly!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sick of the massive huge Google+ profile images? Well, this extension reduces it back down to a manageable size, whilst still ensuring a Google Plus profile page looks good :P
